WorkItem.Description:
CSSL3DeepZoom, VBSL3DeepZoom
This would be a wow part of next release. Please write it with your full energy.
 
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc645050(VS.95).aspx
 
Please basically demonstrate:
 
1. How to add a selection rectangle.
2. Pop up a description message over the sub image when it is selected.
3. Zooming/Moving the popup along with the zooming/moving of images (optional).
